title: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirtied even though no changes are made, and the code assist feature does not appear.
EB: The file should not be marked as dirtied unless actual changes are made. The code assist feature should be displayed when using code assist.
SR:
1. Open the file in the software.
2. Use the code assist feature.
3. Verify that the file is marked as dirtied even though no changes were made.
4. Confirm that the code assist feature does not appear.
